title: Check for New Ethics Opinions
description: A law firm's ethics counsel needs to check for any new ethics opinions issued by the state bar association in the last month.

tasks.description: Navigate to the state bar association's website and find the 'Ethics Opinions' section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the correct webpage.

tasks.description: Filter the opinions by date to see what has been published in the last 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies one new ethics opinion.

tasks.description: Summarize the new opinion and its potential impact on the firm's practices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise summary for internal distribution.
